reporter_caption.center: QUAKER CO. v. SIBARCO STATIONS, INC., 433 Pa. 610 (1969)

caption.center: Quaker Company v. Sibarco Stations, Inc., Appellant.

opinion.panel: Argued November 25, 1968. Before BELL, C. J., JONES, COHEN, EAGEN, O'BRIEN and ROBERTS, JJ.
opinion.posture:
Appeal, No. 453, Jan. T., 1968, from judgment of Court of Common Pleas No. 2 of Philadelphia County, Sept. T., 1966, No. 2845, in case of Quaker Company et al. v. Sibarco Stations, Inc. Judgment affirmed.
Assumpsit. Before DOTY, J.
Verdict for plaintiffs; defendant's motions for new trial and judgment n.o.v. denied and judgment entered on the verdict. Defendant appealed.
opinion.attorneys:
M. Carton Dittmann, Jr., with him E. Humes Garber, John M.Demcisak, and Ballard, Spahr, Andrews Ingersoll, for appellant.
David Berger, with him Herbert B. Newberg, Howard L.Schambelan, and Cohen, Shapiro, Berger, Polisher and Cohen, for appellees.
